attributes.additional_details: allow driving lessons to re start.this is education and if teachers can be in a class of 30 plus students an instructor can have 1 to 1 following all guidelines this is education and vital to so many.
attributes.background: allow england to restart driving lessons and tests throughout lockdown. this is essential and education.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/557462

Since you started your petition driving lessons and certain types of tests have restarted. You can find out what is currently allowed here: https://www.gov.uk/guidance/covid-19-coronavirus-restrictions-what-you-can-and-cannot-do#driving-lessons-and-learning-to-drive
